desription: A family favorite with our kids!
ingredients: 1 27oz can green Hatch chiles enchilada sauce
instructions: Mix together in a bowl the chicken, half the cheese, and a quarter of the enchilada sauce, and 1 can of the olives.
Mix together in a separate bowl the remaining enchilada sauce, half of the remaining cheese, the sour cream, and the soup until thoroughly combined.
Place a large spoonful of the sauce mixture in the center of a dinner plate. Next place a tortilla in the sauce, completely coating the side. Flip the tortilla over and cover the other side.

Place a scoop of the chicken mixture on one half of the tortilla and then roll tightly. Place the rolled enchilada into a 13 x 9 baking dish that has been lightly coated with the sauce mixture. Repeat the last two steps until you have filled all 12 tortillas.
Pour remaining sauce over the enchiladas. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese and sliced olives. Place dish in the oven.
Bake for 20-30 minutes, until the cheese has melted and the edges of the enchiladas just start to crisp up and turn brown.
Remove from oven and let rest for 10 minutes before serving.
